name: Super Anti-Aging Night Cream
about: What it is:A nurturing yet lightweight night cream that visibly hydrates, purifies, and restores overnight, so you wake up with a fresher-, plumper-, dewier-looking complexion..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Polyglutamic Acid: Hydrates, visibly plumps fine lines and wrinkles, and supports the skin barrier..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This nourishing yet lightweight night cream supports skin's natural nighttime reparative processes involving microcirculation and the skin barrier while also providing hydration and preventing trans-epidermal water loss. Skin is left looking smoother, plumper, and firmer.
ingredients: -Polyglutamic Acid: Hydrates, visibly plumps fine lines and wrinkles, and supports the skin barrier..-Purslane: Is an antioxidant powerhouse. .-Nonapeptide-1 (Avocado Peptides): Protects and cares for skin by supporting microcirculation...Aqua/Water/Eau, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Lactobacillus/Portulaca Oleracea Ferment Extract, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Panthenol, Sodium Polyglutamate, Maltodextrin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Nonapeptide-1, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Pantolactone, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Disodium Phosphate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to your face and neck in the evening, after cleansing and serum application. .-For best results, use with Super Anti-Aging Serum (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried using this for a month.. it's not a rich texture cream at all. I was told it's a game changer by the employees but it did nothing for my face at all. It didn't even feel that hydrating to be honest. It was underwhelming and I feel like I wasted my money on snake oil..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was initially hesitant about this cream's ability to prevent water loss, fearing it might feel heavy or suffocating on my skin. However, I was pleasantly surprised! The formula is surprisingly lightweight and breathable, yet it still deeply nourishes my skin, leaving it radiant. I absolutely love it! It's complimentary from dr barbara sturm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This luxurious cream is a true delight for mature skin. Its rich, hydrating formula leaves my complexion feeling plump and supple, and I wake up to a radiant glow every morning. A little goes a long way, so I believe it's a worthwhile investment. it's complimentary from dr barbara sturm

reviews.review_text: This night cream is one of the best night creams I‚Äôve tried. I'm on my fourth jar. Not only is this night cream rich and moisturizing, I feel it plumps up the skin quite nicely as well. It competes many of the night creams on the market. Definitely a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this product. It is a staple in my routine. It smells so luxurious and leaves my skin feeling amazing!

reviews.review_text: I use the super anti aging cream in the morning and the night cream before I sleep. I wake up with such glowing, healthy looking soft skin! I like the texture and that it doesn‚Äôt feel too heavy on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The super anti aging part of it is yet to be seen but what I do know is that in the moisturizer category this one is superior and on par with all other high end skincare brands. I feel that the jar is also a decent size for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Dr. Barbara Sturm Super Anti-Aging Night Cream is an amazing product! It might be an investment, but it's an investment in self-care. I love that it works by supporting the skin's natural overnight renewal process, so you wake up with fresh, plump, hydrated skin. I also love that it boosts collagen production, strengthens your natural skin barrier, improves elasticity, and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream at night especially applied on top of a hyaluronic acid. This feels so rich yet lightweight on the skin. By morning my skin still feels hydrated and plump and I‚Äôve noticed that helps minimize my fine lines perfect for the these dryer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For a while now, my skin has been looking tired and dull. I have been using this night cream for a little over a week now, and I have seen a dramatic change. The hydration is top-tier! When I wake up my skin is still glowing, and it is soft and smooth to the touch. To say that my skin has enjoyed this night cream would be an understatement. This product truly delivers on what it claims to do, which is why I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love anything that this brand is a part of but this cream felt really sticky when applied to my face. it even felt sticky my hands,  after a while it did go away but still didn‚Äôt like it. The packaging is cute and compact. my fave did feel hydrated after though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A very nourishing cream.. Has a rich and beautiful texture that goes on smoothly on skin.. A little goes a long way and doesn't feel heavy, tacky or greasy.. I love how it feels on my skin.. It's hydrating,  makes my skin soft, smooth and bouncy.. It even gives me a beautiful healthy looking glow in the morning..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Introducing Dr. Barbara Sturm‚Äôs newest member of the family & this beauty is super promising! It‚Äôs her SUPER ANTI-AGING NIGHT CREAM which will aid the skin's ‚Äúnocturnal renewal processes‚Äù which usually between 10pm to 2 am. It‚Äôs a process that allows you to wake with a fresher, plumper & possibly a dewier complexion. The newest addition to her lineup is the ultimate performer of The Super Anti-Aging Collection & the partner to her bestselling NIGHT SERUM! The SUPER ANTI-AGING NIGHT CREAM! You see at night our skin shifts from protect to repair mode, an essential hormones such as Melatonin & HGH start to rise just accelerate skin's repair & cell regeneration. Aiding your body with detoxifying excess metabolic & oxidative damage. Also it‚Äôs helpful fighting off free radicals, hopefully preventing damage like wrinkles, lines, dark spots & hyperpigmentation from starting. Plus as we grow & our cellular skin functions slow down naturally so detoxification or ‚Äúour skin's ability to repair the effects of oxidative stress‚Äù- becomes less effective. Our cell renewal decreases & the skin produces less oils, free radicals & oxidized protein waste accumulate, preventing the skin from effective repair and regeneration. This beauty will help our skin hydrate the surface, preventing transepidermal water loss or TEWL for an instant, plumping effect! Also boost detoxification so the skin can concentrate its on repair & rejuvenation. It‚Äôll aid with skin stimulating collagen production & strengthening our skin's circulation. It will help improve the skin elasticity & reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, & any other skin issues you possibly have. Totally recommend!! Find it here- https://app.im.skeepers.io/c/hbwz3/r/hbjsf Overall using this booty for 14 days straight, I can honestly say my skin is a lot more plump especially in the morning. It does it claims and I love what it‚Äôs doing for Skin so far! Can‚Äôt wait for those ultimate results! Mahalo Dr Barbra Strum & Team! Xoxox

reviews.review_text: One of the things I need in the winter time is a very moisturizing night cream. I love this one because it is so rich yet it does not clog my pores. I wake up in the morning with super soft and plump skin.

reviews.review_text: This cream is so luxurious and rich and has made my skin feel nourished and healthier. However, the price point is pretty high so not sure how realistic it will be to keep this in my routine going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Dr Barbara Sturm products so I was super excited to try this. It feels luxurious as always. It is a thinner cream than is normally my preference but My skin felt soft and renewed in the morning.

reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try the anti-aging night cream and it didn‚Äôt disappoint. If I could run this cream all over my body I would!!! First, the texture is light and airy but combined with a good serum it‚Äôs a match made in heaven. It‚Äôs been super cold here and very dry which made my chin and cheeks extra red and sensitive. This helped out a lot. Must buy !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This super anti-aging night cream by Dr Barbara Sturm is so nice on my skin. I have dry skin and while this is creamy it is also lightweight but still very hydrating and soothing. Non-irritating and seems really barrier protective. I‚Äôve used it for a couple of weeks so I‚Äôm excited to see more benefits as I continue to use it. Nice luxury anti-aging treatment moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: Suitable for sensitive skin, luxurious night treat
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I already use the Barbars Sturm vit c serum as part of my nightly skincare routine, so I was excited to try out this cream paired with it.  I personally prefer slightly scented products and this cream has no scent at all, but that makes it a great product for everyone, as there is no risk of irritation for even the most sensitive skin.  The packaging is very less-is-more, simple and sleek and free of any gimmicky print, which I like.  Feels very luxurious and so does the cream itself.  I have dry skin and initially, I worried the cream wouldn't be moisturizing enough, as it is very lightweight for a night cream and immediately absorbed, but it is surprisingly hydrating! This hydrates and plumps my skin without feeling heavy or leaving a film on my skin, which makes it easy to layer.  This cream is my new go-to nightly moisturizer, but I'm deducting 1 star because I would prefer it to be richer, it is a little difficult to differentiate between the day cream and night cream as the packaging is nearly identical and I would've loved a spatula or similar included. Otherwise, this is a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i am a huge fan of the dr. strum line -- this lotion at night is so thick but also glides on my skin so amazingly. there is really no scent which i like and i wake up to very hydrated skin. it is a pricey price in my skincare toolbox.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used products from Barbara Sturm before, so was keen to use this one. I felt that overall, this worked quite well for my skin and I woke up feeling hydrated and good. The consistency is rich, and you see your skin looking moisturised when using this. The biggest concern for me is the price point, which is very high!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Dr. Barbara Sturm Super Anti-Aging Night Cream in exchange for a review.  Thank you@drbarbarasturm for giving me a chance to try this. It contains Polyglutamic acid and Hyaluronic acid for moisture, Nonapeptide-1 to strengthen the skin barrier and boost radiance, and avocado peptides to prevent oxidation.  The cream is a easily absorbed, medium weight cream that doesn't leave your skin feeling greasy or suffocated.  The next morning,  my skin looks even and moisturized.  I've not had any adverse reactions to using this,  except that it will hurt my wallet üòÇ.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No scent. No perfume. A light moisturizer . Doesn‚Äôt burn on my skin. I like my night creams to be much thicker and much more hydrating so I wouldn‚Äôt purchase this.    Is it worth the price ? That‚Äôs for you to decide however know that it‚Äôs nothing but marketing. It‚Äôs not a bad product and for 25 bucks it would be a good choice. It‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt irritate my skin but doesn‚Äôt provide the moisture it needs either.   Do not fall for the marketing trick! Just because it‚Äôs listed at almost 400 bucks doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs any better than some decent unscented drug store moisturizer.   If you think spending half your rent (depending) on a moisturizer will mean it‚Äôll be super anti aging and some miracle product you‚Äôll be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dr. Sturm never disappoints! I have several products in this collection and this one is fabulous. Luxe packaging and a heavy jar. reviews.review_text: Omg there are not enough words to describe how much I love this night cream. I received this night cream as a gift and will definitely repurchase with my own money later. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dr. Sturm‚Äôs Super Anti-Aging Night Cream is an absolute winner for me! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In colder months, my skin tends to get drier, causing stubborn dry spots. reviews.review_text: I adore this cream; it's an absolute gem for my skincare routine. Dealing with combination skin can be tricky, especially with an oily T-zone and dry cheeks during colder months. The struggle to find a product that hydrates without making the oily areas worse is ever present. Thankfully, this cream excels at providing the perfect balance. It works wonders, providing intense hydration to combat dryness on my cheeks while feeling light on my skin so that it doesn‚Äôt aggravate the oily regions. It's my go-to solution for waking up with nourished and well-balanced skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Super Anti-Aging Day Cream but needed something a little more hydrating in the winter and I love this night cream! My skin feels hydrated and plump in the morning, instead of dry around my nose. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Give your skin a overnight spa treatment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My night skin regimen is a bit different than my day regimen. I tend to use thicker creams because they have the chance to absorb longer. The Barbara Sturm night cream was the perfect consistency and didn‚Äôt weigh heavily on my face. Sometimes when I feel lazy, I use this cream as a catch all because it hydrates as well as tones my face while I‚Äôm asleep. After a nights use, I wake up feeling refreshed and my skin feels rejuvenated.. almost as if I had a facial! I also recommend to pair this with the Barbara Sturm eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream is divine. It‚Äôs nourishment and hydration in a jar. A small amount is enough for my entire face and leaves my skin glowy and my dry spots disappear so fast. It sinks into my skin and leaves a youthful look behind. One of the best brands I‚Äôve tried so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Sturm Super Anti-Aging Night Cream is a nighttime miracle in a jar. This luxurious cream has transformed my skin overnight.   The rich, velvety texture feels indulgent and deeply hydrating. Upon waking up, my complexion appears plump, radiant, and rejuvenated.   The potent blend of anti-aging ingredients, like purslane and retinol, has visibly diminished fine lines and wrinkles.   I love how this cream absorbs effortlessly and doesn't leave any residue.   If you desire a nighttime skincare superstar that delivers exceptional results, Sturm Super Anti-Aging Night Cream is the answer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second jar I use of this amazing cream it‚Äôs one of the best ones I ever used.  Leaves your skin hydrated and you see youthful skin after  using it.  I really enjoy it so much my mom is always using it also. I‚Äôm 35 and it‚Äôs best to take care of your skin with good quality products and good ingredients this is a must have.  I have dry skin also and it has changed it. Super plumpd and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom swears by this stuff ! She has seen a noticeable difference in her fine lines and wrinkles since she‚Äôs started using this product. It‚Äôs expensive but she swears by it and it‚Äôs cheaper than the plastic surgeon!

reviews.review_text: . It is very moisturising especially for this colder months. It helps to reduce the appearance of fine line and wrinkles. It helps to combat dryness and elasticity . It gives the skin intensed hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Dr.Barbara Sturm products I tried so far, and this night cream is no exception. It has a very luxurious texture and feels lovely on the skin when applied. In the morning, the skin on my face and neck feels moisturized and more plump. I have only used it about five times so far, but I like the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This night cream is absolutely amazing. I use it in combination with the day cream and in 2 weeks, but face seems brighter and more hydrated when I wake up each morning. I have also seen an improvement in some of my fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels so good waking up from using this cream at night. My skin feels so hydrated and silk. It absolutely feels so luxurious on my skin. It is an experience on its own putting this at night. Its thick and hydrating which I love as night creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this night cream has been working wonders for my skin! I am in my 30s and have noticed my skin looking more dull and losing some firmness. Since I‚Äôve been using this, my skin is looking and feeling so much better! It is well hydrated and balanced when I wake up. It also seems to look firmer and plump. Loving this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the chance recently to try this night cream and was amazed at how hydrating it is! I applied it to my cleanser face at night before bed and woke up the next day with skin that felt super hydtrated and soft! Haven‚Äôt had that overnight improvement with any other product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received complementary from Dr. Barbara Sturm. I have used two other products from Dr. Barbara Sturm that I love, and this night cream was no different.  This leaves my skin soft and smooth. It absorbs in nicely and doesn't feel greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite moisturizer of all time. It does hydrate my skin and it looks so fresh. I‚Äôve been using this for a few years and won‚Äôt use any other brand as once you‚Äôre used to it is no other brand would come even close to.

reviews.review_title: The very best cream in the Sturm line
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite skin care product (much the dismay of my wallet). Having tried quite a bit fo her line, not every Sturm product does much for my skin. The Face Cream and the Super Anti Aging Night Cream, however, are really spectacular. The ingredients aren't anything wild -- avocado, nonapeptide-1, polyglumatic acid, purslane - but something in the formulation is magic for my 40+ male skin. It goes on very smoothly and non-greasy, and mostly absorbs -- the polyglumatic acid creates something of a barrier to prevent water loss while you sleep, so you feel it but it's not tacky or thick. In the morning my skin is soft, has a nice glow to it, and my most problematic lines on my forehead and around my nose/under my eyes are significantly reduced. I use the original Face Cream in the morning (more accessible at half the price) and those are my two big splurges for my skincare. They also last quite a while, as you need only dab your finger in the jar, and you have enough to cover the whole face and neck. I'd say each jar lasts 3-4 months, so when framed like that, it's not entirely prohibitive. I do wish I was able to buy it more frequently and not have to wait for sales and coupons (that don't really make too much of a dent in the price) but the quality really is there for me, and my skin loves it, so I must listen. Whenever I try to get something cheaper to replace it with for a while, I regret it. (Note: very much not an incentivized review, but certainly wouldn't say no to some Sturn thrown my way.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When trying this for the first time, I didn‚Äôt know what to expect so I was delighted to find this wasn‚Äôt a heavy, thick, moisturizer or cream. This absorbed into my skin fully and didn‚Äôt leave it feeling greasy. I‚Äôve been using this for sometime now and while I don‚Äôt see any anti-aging effects per se, I have noticed that my skin is definitely more moisturized and my redness is definitely a lot better My skin looks a lot better. Unfortunately I just haven‚Äôt seen the fine lines around. what do use yet. It‚Äôs a wonderful hydrating moisturizer but at the price point I expect more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say about this super anti aging night face cream? I AM OBSESSED!! I am really impressed of it. My skin loves this cream and my wrinkles thanks it a lot. It a beautiful night cuddle for yourself. It leaves my skin smooth and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing compares to how fantastic this product is! My skin has never felt so rejuvenated and hydrated and I have tried many different products. It truly is worth the investment in this brand. I can tell a noticeable difference in just a few days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream so much! I use it and the next day I immediately see my skin is more plump and brighter! I have terrible forehead wrinkles and under eye bags and I noticed my forehead and eyes have improved greatly. I highly recommend this cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely a gorgeous face cream. The price is steep, but my skin loves it. It is rich but not too rich for both fall and winter use. I have dry, sensitive skin and my skin looks gorgeous and feels so soft and plump when I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! It leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, and super clean! I would highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for an anti aging moisturizer! It‚Äôs definitely on the pricier side but worth it in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Barbara Sturm products, especially the anti aging night cream. Retinols tend to be too harsh on skin but this night cream is gentle which still being effective. It also absorbs quickly while still hydrating. 4 stars because of the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the super anti aging nifht cream and it cpuldnt have come at a better time. My skin gets super dry this time of year and craves moisture. It works ok but fir the price meh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Anti-aging night cream repaired my skin barrier especially now using retinol and my skin is really purging. I love how my skin feels so hydrated each time I apply this cream. I‚Äôm combination to dry and this really keeps me hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product literally did nothing for my skin. At the very least I would have expected it to be a decent moisturizer, but honestly, I have used drug store brands that produce more results than this. I used this over the night serum (which contains a lot of  alcohol), and my I woke up to dry dull skin night after night. I stupidly bought most of this brands products, and I feel duped. The only product that I somewhat liked was the eye cream, but I still don't believe it is worth the ridiculous price.  In order not to waste them I have been using them on my arms and chest. For those of you that think that spending a lot of money means results, this brand is the perfect example of why this isn't true.

reviews.review_text: Horrible! And WAY TOO EXPENSIVE FOR SOMETHING THIS BAD!!! IF I COULD GIVE THIS 1 STAR I WOULD!!

reviews.review_text: This product genuinely is a year-round, 365 game changer. No matter the concern, this cream will work overtime to correct it. Intrigued as to why this and the original SAA cream don't receive industry awards.
